CatDescriptText: Attorney Byrd Brown (1929-2001) son of Judge Homer S. Brown, was president of the Pittsburgh branch of the NAACP from 1958 to 1971. He ran for congress in 1970, and for Mayor of Pittsburgh in 1989.
TitMainTitle: Man behind lectern with Pittsburgh NAACP president Byrd Brown seated in foreground, and Jackie Robinson [partially obscured] in background
